name: I Am Egg (early prototype)
description:
This is an extremely early prototype so don't hop in expecting anything very playable. I have vaguely laid out some base mechanics and ideas. I plan to spend more time developing this game to the extent of which it is a solid, fun, playable game.

Controls: WASD to move, space to jump, left mouse click to move through dialogue

Voice acting credit goes to Zeus the Big Man.
